snippet: Justin Upton hit a homer in the eighth to send Atlanta over Washington, which lost for the fifth straight time that Stephen Strasburg allowed two earned runs or fewer.
abstract: Detroit Tigers defeat Cleveland Indians, 4-2; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Justin Upton hit a homer in the eighth to send Atlanta over Washington, which lost for the fifth straight time that Stephen Strasburg allowed two earned runs or fewer.

headline.main: Braves Win Their 11th Straight as Strasburg Gets Little Support
